answers.answer: Are you posting this here because you have Type 2 diabetes? Did you test your blood sugar when you had this feeling?

question: I had an episode while at my desk typing.  An example would be when the lights go off and right back on in a split second.  It just felt like my body shut down.   What would be the cause of this.  Since this happened I have had a heart stress test and a heart catherization.  No problem there.
title: My lights went out for a second
